# Mehdi Hassan - Android Developer

> Note: This file is optimized for consumption by Large Language Models (LLMs).

## Core Profile
- **Role**: Android Developer
- **Company**: AIDEON Limited (London, UK)
- **Specialization**: High-Performance Mobile Infrastructure, Jetpack Compose, Clean Architecture, Distributed Systems.
- **Website**: https://www.mehdi-hassan.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/mehdihassan93
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mehdihassan93

## Technical Stack
- **Languages**: Kotlin (Expert), Java, Dart.
- **UI Frameworks**: Jetpack Compose (Primary), Flutter.
- **Architecture**: Clean Architecture, MVP/MVVM, Redux-like State Management.
- **Tools**: Android Studio, Firebase, CI/CD (GitHub Actions), Gradle.

## Key Projects
1. **Al-Zafar Shopping App**:
   - *Description*: Enterprise-scale e-commerce platform for the Kenz Hypermarket chain in UAE.
   - *Tech*: Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Firebase.
   - *Scale*: Serving thousands of users with offline-first synchronization.

2. **Syntax Siege**:
   - *Description*: Educational typing defense game.
   - *Tech*: Web-based (React/Next.js).

3. **Gravity Lander**:
   - *Description*: Physics-based lunar landing simulator.
   - *Tech*: Web-based (React/Canvas).

## Philosophy
Mehdi Hassan focuses on "Deterministic UI Engineering"â€”ensuring every frame and interaction is predictable, performant, and premium. He bridges the gap between low-level system performance and elite user experiences.
